name: Protect the Nest #randomgame
description:
Take control of three sleepy laser birds and defend your nest from the unstopping horde of evil magic swords. They can only be defeated by a specific laser scream, so coordinate your attacks and try to save the eggs for as long as you can.

CONTROLS

Laser Bird / ControlRotate lockwiseLaser attackRotate counter-clockwiseRedQWEBlueRTYYellowUIO

This game was inspired by the following icons from #randomicon. Grab a draft and get creative!
